capability.name: Financial Instrument Valuation
capability.definition: This Service Domain provides a range of financial asset valuation services
capability.role: Provide securities/asset valuation services. A wide range of valuation approaches can be applied to a range of different instrument/asset types. This Service Domain implements a process by which the most appropriate valuation method is selected and applied in the context of the valuation request and the purpose of the valuation. The fundamental pricing principle is based on an analysis of the present value of expected cash flows. This calculation involves identifying the expected cash flows, determining appropriate (range of)interest rates that might discount future cash flows and calculate the current value of future cash flows applying those interest rates
capability.example: The assets held in an investment portfolio are subject to valuation as part of an annual performance report
